content.html: “Shopify's monolith is deployed approximately every 30 minutes, so aside from weekends, we're pretty much constantly in that “warm-up phase” Shopify Engineering: Adventures in Garbage Collection: Improving GC Performance in our Massive Monolith (2023) shopify.engineering/adventures-in-…
content.value:
“Shopify's monolith is deployed approximately every 30 minutes, so aside from weekends, we're pretty much constantly in that “warm-up phase”

Shopify Engineering: Adventures in Garbage Collection: Improving GC Performance in our Massive Monolith (2023) shopify.engineering/adventures-in-…

content.html:
Great article from @ShopifyEng on improving Ruby GC latency. But I feel like as a society maybe we’re spending these cycles in the wrong place? If we’re going to work on Garbage Collection, could we maybe look at some higher value use cases? Like, say the U.S. Supreme Court.
twitter.com/realgenekim/st…
content.value:
Great article from @ShopifyEng on improving Ruby GC latency.

But I feel like as a society maybe we’re spending these cycles in the wrong place?

If we’re going to work on Garbage Collection, could we maybe look at some higher value use cases?

Like, say the U.S. Supreme Court.
